description: This source file implements functions for discovering media servers (UPnP MediaServer devices) on a network, including device registration, browsing directories, and handling device connection events.

methods.name: gint g_list_find_udn(mediaServerCfg * gwData,gconstpointer * udn)
methods.description: Custom comparison function to find a media server in the list by its UDN (Unique Device Name).

methods.name: gboolean browse_remote_directory(GUPnPServiceInfo * browserService,gchar * root,int startIndex,int maxCount,guint * totalResults,gchar ** result)
methods.description: Performs a UPnP browse action to retrieve media objects from a media server.

methods.name: bool browse_remote_dir_with_udn(const char * server_udn,const char * path_id,int start_index,int max_entries,int * totalCount,char ** results)
methods.description: Finds a media server by UDN and initiates browsing its directory.

methods.name: void device_proxy_available_mr_cb(GUPnPControlPoint * cp,GUPnPDeviceProxy * dproxy)
methods.description: Callback invoked when a new media server device is discovered.

methods.name: void device_proxy_unavailable_mr_cb(GUPnPControlPoint * cp,GUPnPDeviceProxy * dproxy)
methods.description: Callback invoked when a media server device disconnects.

methods.name: void registerBrowserConfig(GUPnPContext * context)
methods.description: Registers a control point for media server discovery and sets up callbacks.

methods.name: void init_media_browser()
methods.description: Initializes media browsing resources and mutex.

methods.name: void close_media_browser()
methods.description: Cleans up media browsing resources and mutex.

ctags.name: browse_remote_dir_with_udn
ctags.pattern: /^bool browse_remote_dir_with_udn(const char *server_udn, const char *path_id, int start_index,$/
ctags.signature: (const char * server_udn,const char * path_id,int start_index,int max_entries,int * totalCount,char ** results)

ctags.name: browse_remote_directory
ctags.signature: (GUPnPServiceInfo * browserService,gchar * root,int startIndex,int maxCount,guint * totalResults,gchar ** result)
